Articles.Content: Hey fellow Kerbalnaughts I wanted to share with you my new KSP video this video is a lets play with more of an informative stand point geared towards new players. Now unfortunately I had a few minor problems mainly an engine decided to leave the ship early and it led to a catastrophic failure. I hope you all enjoyed the video and please feel free to leave feed back or critique as you like. I am still new to KSP so I don't have the complex systems nailed down just yet hopefully soon I will make it to the MUN.
Nice video, but this goes in Live From Mission Control! Oh yeah you should also say Kerbin and not Earth. I think it bugs everyone.
Hey thanks and I will do my best from now on to say Kerbin haha gotta remember these things.
